dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2791 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the maximum amount of housing loan guaranty entitlement available to certain veterans under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Miller of Ohio introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the maximum amount of housing loan guaranty entitlement available to certain veterans under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

section.header: Increase to maximum amount of housing loan guaranty entitlement available to certain veterans
section.text: Clause (ii) of section 3703(a)(1)(C) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking 25 percent of the Freddie Mac conforming loan limit and inserting 25 percent of the product of the Freddie Mac conforming loan limit multiplied by 1.5.
